#Text=Eastern Circuit
#Text=The Eastern Circuit ( 道東 Dōtō ) covers the eastern half of the northern Japan ese island of Hokkaido .
#Text=Regions
#Text=The Eastern Circuit is composed of the following four subprefectures :
#Text=Okhotsk – it was renamed from the earlier Abashiri Subprefecture on 2010
#Text=Tokachi – the region is dominated by the Tokachi Plain , a major agricultural area
#Text=Kushiro – the region is dominated by the Kushiro Plain , a major agricultural area
#Text=Nemuro – the region is dominated by the Nemuro Plain , a major agricultural area
#Text=Cities
#Text=( 釧路市 Kushiro-shi ) – the largest city in the Circuit with 200,000 people
#Text=( 網走市 Abashiri-shi ) – fishing town famous for drift ice and infamous for its prison
#Text=( 北見市 Kitami-shi ) – the onion capital of Japan
#Text=( 紋別市 Monbetsu-shi )
#Text=( 根室市 Nemuro-shi ) – at the easternmost tip of Hokkaido
#Text=( 帯広市 Obihiro-shi ) – the main city in the Tokachi Plain , a large
#Text=agricultural area
#Text=Towns
#Text=( 美幌町 Bihoro-chō ) – gateway to the Akan National Park
#Text=( 斜里町 Shari-chō ) – gateway to Shiretoko National Park and home of onsen village Utoro
#Text=Other destinations
#Text=National Parks
#Text=( 阿寒摩周国立公園 Akan Mashu Kokuritsu Kōen ) – known for the crystalline mountain lakes of Akan , Kussharo and Mashu
#Text=( 大雪山国立公園 Daisetsuzan Kokuritsu Kōen ) , – Japan 's largest national park named after its " Great Snowy Mountains "
#Text=( 釧路湿原国立公園 Kushiro-shitsugen Kokuritsu Kōen )
#Text=( 知床国立公園 Shiretoko Kokuritsu Kōen ) – the most inaccessible and least explored of Japan 's national parks
#Text=Understand
#Text=The most sparsely populated region in all Japan , this vast area is nearly 40,000 km ² in size .
#Text=While the easternmost part is largely flat , rural and filled with endless cow pastures , much of the circuit is ringed with mountains .
#Text=By plane
#Text=Kushiro , Monbetsu and Ōzora , Memanbetsu ( near Abashiri ) have regional airports .
#Text=Get around
#Text=Here , if anywhere in Japan , a rental car will come in handy .
#Text=Train coverage is severely lacking ( many lines have been terminated due to a lack of customers ) and buses are infrequent , inconvenient and expensive .
#Text=Do
#Text=Eastern Hokkaido has beautiful coastline , wonderful outdoor hot springs , and remote hiking .
#Text=Some combination of these should make for a satisfying visit .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Hokkaido on the whole is good for seafood — if you 're on the coast — and dairy , and the east is no exception .
#Text=In central Hokkaido , near Asahikawa and Furano , there are a plethora of melon stands , though by foreign standards , Japanese melons are exceedingly expensive .
#Text=Pork Bowl ( 豚丼 Buta-don ) .
#Text=Pork bowl with sightly bigger pork .
#Text=Obihiro is originated , it is possible to eat in Tokachi whole area .
